name: JEEVAN JYOTI SAMAJ SEWA SANSTHAN
briefDescription: Jeevan Jyoti Samaj Sewa Sansthan is a Twenty years old  non-profit  organization  working  on  Grass root  level in the  field of  Exhibition / Workshop  and  Book Fair & Seminar with the assistance of National Book Trust ,Govt. of  India, Promotion of  Urdu Language for minority and other communities in  civil society and WSHG members, working  as Udyamy  Mitra ,Cluster   Development   Agency, Empowerment  of women and  networking of the  poor as its prime goal and   objective. Empowerment can be one of  the basic that  can  enable  SHGs. to  improve  their conditions  through   socio-economic development  programs.  The   Organization  proposes  to  reach  the  deprived marginalized or isolated  segments of  the society  and  target them as a priority    by finding our way into remote & rural areas to identify  the poorest  segments   of  communities who are normally excluded and deprived   from  development processes because of their isolation, lack of assets and awareness.    Organization has vast experience of organizing training  programs for the rural development of Minorities, Deprived women and isolated segment of the society. Organization used to organize Exhibition  and  awareness  programs for the  sale of the products of WSHGs.  for  their  sustainable  socio- economic development.
